title: We want to see your work
content:
OpenAI to the NYT show us your reporters notes we want to see if its even copyrightable.

NYT responds, “given the wildly improper scope of this request, one has to wonder if a chilling effect is exactly what OpenAI, who appears to have stolen from millions of content creators, is hoping for.”  https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/24791465-nyt-openai-letter
author: MDG
